description: Episode number 58 of Series "English at work". This video explains the role of the Family Court in divorce cases. It explains the grounds for applying for divorce, and the issues involved in a divorce in Australia. It also explains options offered by the Family Court after an application for divorce has been made: the structure of Information sessions, conciliation conferences, and court counsellors to help resolve differences in the main areas of dispute; children and property.
